#Problem 2

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(haven)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r read }
pols_month = read_csv("./pols-month.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
 mutate(date = lubridate::floor_date(mon, "month"),
       president =ifelse(prez_dem == 0, "gop", "dem")) %>%
  select(., -prez_dem, -prez_gop)

gdp = read_csv("./GDP.csv") %>%
  clean_names() 


total = full_join(gdp,pols_month, by = c("date")) 
```

```{r plot}
total %>%
ggplot(aes(x = date, y = value, color=president)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_path(aes(group=president))+
  labs(title="Distribution of GDP value in two parties",y="GDP value")
```
